channel.title: Help Running
channel.description:
So, I'm Raffo, Owned RaffoScape, I Quited, Then Came Back About 10 Minutes Ago To Try Again. I Try To "Run, Run.bat". And This Comes Up:
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
My "Run.bat" File Contains:
[code]@echo off title RPS java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
And My JDK Version, In The "Java" File Located "C:\Program Files\Java" It Says:
[code]jdk1.6.0_06 jre1.6.0 jre1.6.0_0.6[/code]
Please Help.

item.title: Help Running
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Master1 RSPS Master
item.description:
@RSPS_Master1 wrote:

A double post is un-needed. Please stick to one post.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Running
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

So, I’m Raffo, Owned RaffoScape, I Quited, Then Came Back About 10 Minutes Ago To Try Again.
I Try To “Run, Run.bat”.
And This Comes Up:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

My “Run.bat” File Contains:

@echo off title RPS java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

And My JDK Version, In The “Java” File Located “C:\Program Files\Java” It Says:

jdk1.6.0_06 jre1.6.0 jre1.6.0_0.6

Please Help.

Read full topic
